annotations.description: The Enzoni was created by Barman Vincenzo Errico while working at the legendary NYC bar Milk & Honey. Errico was an Italian bartender who Sasha Petraske (fou...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Enzoni

textContent:
1oz or 30ml Gin
1oz or 30ml Campari
.75oz or 20ml Lemon Juice 
.5oz or 15ml Simple Syrup
4 to 5 Green Seedless Grapes
Garnish with a Grape

Add ingredients to shaker. 
Muddle grapes a little bit. 
Double strain. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pBAp-zAkq0M
title: Enzoni
